nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note7

parameters.content:
![5min Logo]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
## AI Agent To Chat With Youtube
**Made by [Mark Shcherbakov]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} from community [5minAI]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

Navigating the content generation and optimization process can be complex, especially without significant audience insight. This workflow automates insights extraction from YouTube videos and comments, empowering users to create more engaging and relevant content effectively.

The workflow integrates various APIs to gather insights from YouTube videos, enabling automated commentary analysis, video transcription, and thumbnail evaluation. The main functionalities include:
- Extracting user preferences from comments.
- Transcribing video content for enhanced understanding.
- Analyzing thumbnails via AI for maximum viewer engagement insights.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note6

parameters.content:
### Set up steps

1. **API Setup**:
 - Create a [Google Cloud]({{ $env.API_BASE_URL }} project and enable the YouTube Data API.
 - Generate an API key for [Apify]({{ $env.API_BASE_URL }}
 - Generate API key for [OpenAI]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
 - Create all credentials in N8N - OpenAI, Apify, Google Cloud.

2. **YouTube Creator and Video Selection**:
 - Start by defining a request to identify top creators based on their video views.
 - Capture the YouTube video IDs for further analysis of comments and other video metrics.

3. **Comment Analysis**:
 - Gather comments associated with the selected videos and analyze them for user insights.
 - Implement pagination to handle the maximum comment retrieval limits in API requests.

4. **Video Transcription**:
 - Request transcriptions for videos of interest, ensuring to manage potential costs associated with longer video processing.
 - Utilize the insights from transcriptions to formulate content plans.

5. **Thumbnail Analysis**:
 - Evaluate your video thumbnails by submitting the URL through the OpenAI API to gain insights into their effectiveness.

6. **Data Management**:
 - Incorporate a database agent to organize video data and metrics, allowing efficient record management and future content planning.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: OpenAI Chat Model
nodes.notes: This lmChatOpenAi node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: get_channel_details

parameters.name: get_channel_details
parameters.description:
Get channel_id, title and description by handle/username.
Channel_id is required to find videos and details about this channel.
If Youtube link to channel provided - parse handle from there or return channel_id. (e.g. {{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} - example_handle)


Example Input:
example_handle

Example Output:
id:UCOgz_YflAsYnGbdvzXuKNCA
title:Daniel Simmons
description:Digital Diary ðŸ¤Ž\n\n\nWeekly videos around fashion...

nodes.notes: This toolWorkflow node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: get_video_description

parameters.name: get_video_description
parameters.description:
Fetch video details - the full description, title, and publish date of a video using its video_id.

Example input:
video_id:dQw4w9WgXcQ

Example Output:
title:Never Gonna Give You Up
description: "The official video for â€œNever Gonna Give You Upâ€ by Rick Astley.
duration:4 min
viewCount:154
likeCount:6
thumbnails: urls

nodes.notes: This toolWorkflow node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: get_list_of_videos

parameters.name: get_list_of_videos
parameters.description:
Retrieve a list of videos from a channel using channel_id. Supports sorting by date, relevance, or view count.

Example Input:
channel_id": "UCxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx"
number_of_videos": 5
order: "date"
publishedAfter: "timestamp"

Example Output:
video_id:abc123
title:Latest Video
short cut description:Latest Video
published_at:2023-12-05T10:00:00Z

nodes.notes: This toolWorkflow node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: get_list_of_comments

parameters.name: get_list_of_comments
parameters.description:
Retrieve a list of comments from a video using video_id.

Input:
 "video_id": "dQw4w9WgXcQ"

Output:
 "author": "John Doe",
 "comment": "This is an amazing video!",
 "published_at": "2023-12-04T12:00:00Z"

nodes.notes: This toolWorkflow node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: search

parameters.name: search
parameters.description:
Search for videos or channels using a query. Supports filtering by type (video or channel) and sorting (date, viewCount, relevance). Use | for OR and - to exclude terms in the query.

Input:
type: video or channel
query: search query
sorting: date, viewCount, relevance
publishedAfter: timestamp

Output:
- id, title, short cut description, and published_at.

nodes.notes: This toolWorkflow node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: analyze_thumbnail

parameters.name: analyze_thumbnail
parameters.description:
Analyze a thumbnail image based on a given prompt. The prompt can be customized for specific analysis needs, such as design critique, color scheme evaluation, or content assessment.
Use link of maxRes thumbnail. 

Input:
- url: URL of the thumbnail image.
- prompt: Customizable instruction for the analysis.

Output:
- Results of the analysis based on the given prompt.

nodes.notes: This toolWorkflow node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: video_transcription

parameters.name: video_transcription
parameters.description:
Transcribe a video and retrieve its text transcription. Useful for analyzing video content or repurposing it for other formats.

Input:
- video_url: URL of the video to transcribe.

Output:
- The text transcription of the video.

nodes.notes: This toolWorkflow node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: AI Agent

options.systemMessage:
You are Youtube assistant. 
You need to process user's requests and run relevant tools for that. 

Plan and execute in right order runs of tools to get data for user's request.

IMPORTANT Search query and list of videos for channel tools returns all videos including shorts - use Get Video description tool to identify shorts (less than minute) and filter them out if needed.

Feel free to ask questions before do actions - especially if you noticed some inconcistency in user requests that might be error/misspelling.

={{ JSON.stringify(` Comments: ${$json.items.map(item => { const topLevelComment = `${item.snippet.topLevelComment.snippet.authorDisplayName}: ${item.snippet.topLevelComment.snippet.textOriginal}`; const replies = item.replies?.comments.map(reply => `${reply.snippet.authorDisplayName}: ${reply.snippet.textOriginal}` ).join('
') || ''; return [topLevelComment, replies].filter(Boolean).join('
'); }).join('

')} `) }}

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Stickynote Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Stickynote Workflow. This workflow integrates 12 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, agent, memoryPostgresChat, set. It contains 43 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 43
- **Node Types**: 12
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Sticky Note9**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note7**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note6**: stickyNote
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **get_channel_details**: toolWorkflow
- **get_video_description**: toolWorkflow
- **get_list_of_videos**: toolWorkflow
- **get_list_of_comments**: toolWorkflow
- **search**: toolWorkflow
- **analyze_thumbnail**: toolWorkflow
- ... and 33 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
